## svgSize variable

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use workspace.setCachedParentSvgSize. (2021 March 5)
> 

Returns the dimensions of the specified SVG image.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
svgSize: typeof utils.svgMath.svgSize
```
